document_data.name: Shoonach
document_data.mainbody: '''Shoonach''' was the former capital of the [[Shoon Imperium]], located on the border of [[Calimshan]] and [[Tethyr]], and claimed by both.
document_data.History:
Work on Shoonach started as a ploy by King [[Amahl I]] to re-garrison the [[Calishite]] troops sent to keep an eye on him by his grandfather [[Akkabar Shoon the Elder|Akkabar Shoon]]. Construction began on the site of [[Iltakar]], the capital of the old kingdom of [[Mir]]. Surprisingly, Akkabar supported the construction and, when Amahl I was assassinated, construction continued with the stones and slave labor taken from [[Ithmong]] when that city was destroyed to prevent an uprising from angry [[Tethyrian]]s.

By [[1369 DR]], the [[Twisted Rune]] had placed a magical gate in the area to allow for instantaneous movement to other locations.
